# ezca Provider



## Example Usage

```terraform
terraform {
  required_providers {
    ezca = {
      source  = "thomasgeens/ezca"
      version = "0.7.0"
    }
  }
}

provider "ezca" {
  # Configuration options
}
```

## Schema

### Optional

- `bearer` (String, Sensitive)
- `server_url` (String) Server URL (defaults to https://portal.ezca.io/)
